Description

Product Description

Style your hair in curls, waves, flicks, or simply give it a straightened look with the Geepas 3 in 1 Pink Hair Styler. It suits most hair types, and comes with three attachments and two speed controls.

COLOR: MAGENT BASED Blue
WATTAGE & VOLTAGE: 800W 230V 50HZ 360° ROTATION CORD
1 SPEED 3 MODES (COOL/WARM/HOT)
SINGLE OR DUAL VOLTAGE
SAFETY CUT OFF FACILITY

ATTACHMENTS INCLUDED:

  • Concentrator
  • Blow Brush
  • Adjustable Roller Brush
  • Volume Lifter
  • Oval Pneumatic Brush With Soft Protecting Heads
  • Round Brush With Metal Tube
  • Air Iron
